channel.title: Programming on Technology with Safi
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Technology with Safi

item.title: So I made a maze generation program in the terminal using ANSI and here is how I did it
item.description: Here is a brief introduction to ANSI codes and how they are used to colour, position and format text in the terminal and how my code uses them.

item.title: What is the Purpose of Union Data Type in C Language
item.description: At first glance union and struct data types in C language look the same and it seems like the union is useless but they are different and the union has a purpose.
